info.brief_description: You get a new car with all kinds of new secrets.
info.description:
After months of saving you finally can buy your own car. This car has some secrets however, that give the driver total control over the occupants.

The rules:
Keep within the content rating. Sex is fine but we don't need a play by play.
The car knows who the driver is and will only answer the them.
Any transformations, mental or physical, are fine.
Be as detailed as possible when someone transforms. Try to include a picture with entire body changes, tg especially.
